original_text: Saul also went to his home at Gibeah, and with him went men of valor whose hearts God had touched.
korean_text: 사울도 기브아 자기 집으로 갈 때에 마음이 하나님께 감동된 유력한 자들과 함께 갔느니라

sentences.original_text: Saul also went to his home at Gibeah
sentences.korean_translation: 사울 또한 그의 집인 기브아로 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and with him went men of valor
